item.title: FakeCTF - Shellcode 0x1
item.description: Go back to write-ups list Category: Prog Creator: HømardBøy The challenge When we connect to the challenge, we are prompted to send a linux x86-64 shellcode, with a maximum length of 96 bytes. The description of the challenge also says we have to display the content of a file called “flag” located in the same folder as the binary.
